id.description: Unique id for driving license book

dateModified.description: Datetime when book was last modified

id.description: Unique id for driving license book

isDigital.description: Whether driving license book is digital or not (else on paper)

practiceDriving.description: Whether the student can do practice driving

totalLessonTime.description: Sum of all practical lessons in minuetes

totalLessonCount.description: Count of all practical lessons (each lesson is 45 minutes)

teachersAndLessons.description: List af all practical lessons with instructor

drivingSchoolExams.description: List of all driving school tests, grouped by school

exemptions.description: List of all Exemptions for book

response.description: Can the student start driving school 3 based on progress and exemption

reasons.description: Reason why student cant start driving school 3

CanStartDrivingSchoolThree.description: Contains response if student can start driving school 3 and reasons if he can't

id.description: Unique id for digital driving license book

isDigital.description: Whether driving license book is digital or not (else on paper)

licenseOrdered.description: When driving license was ordered from RLS

practiceDriving.description: Whether the student can do practice driving

practiceDrivingGranted.description: When practice driving was granted on driving license digital book

practiceDrivingExpires.description: When practice driving expires on driving license digital book

scorePart1.description: How many points did student get in part 1 (applies to written test)

scorePart2.description: How many points did student get in part 2 (applies to written test)

DrivingLicenceTestResult.description: Information about test resulst for student

schoolEmployeeSsn.description: Driving school employee's social security number

status.description: Status id of DrivingSchoolExam (2 = Completed, 4 = Expired, 9 = Canceled)

bookId.description: Unique id for digital driving license book

hasResult.description: Whether application has result (either approved or denied)

resultIsApproved.description: Whether application for exemption has been approved or denied

resultApprovedExpireDate.description: Date when approved exemption expires (yyyy-MM-dd), empty is exemption never expires

resultBySsn.description: Social security number for employee of SGS that approved/denied the application

resultByName.description: Name of employee of SGS that approved/denied the application

resultComments.description: Comments about the registration for approval/denial

allowedDrivingSchoolTypes.description: Driving school types this organization is allowed to register

bookId.description: Unique id for digital driving license book

minutes.description: Amount of minutes in practical lesson

bookId.description: Unique id for digital driving license book

schoolEmployeeSsn.description: Driving school employee's social security number

statusId.description: Status id of driving school test (2=Finished, 4=Expired, 9=Canceled)

statusName.description: Name of driving school status status

isExemptedFromDrivingLessons.description: If student is exempted from min driving lesson count

finishedDrivingSchool1.description: Does the student have driving school 1 progress

finishedDrivingSchool2.description: Does the student have driving school 2 progress

finishedDrivingSchool3.description: Does the student have driving school 3 progress

StudentDrivingSchoolProgress.description: Contains info on students driving school and driving lessons progress

books.description: List of student's driving license books

hasExamRights.description: Whether student has the rights to take test

reasonKey.description: Reason key if student has not rights

reasonMessage.description: Reason message if student has not rights

bookId.description: Unique id for digital driving license book

hasPassed.description: Whether test has been passed or failed

scorePart1.description: How many points student got from part 1 (only applies to written test)

scorePart2.description: How many points student got from part 2 (only applies to written test)

licenseIssued.description: Whether driver's license has been issued

Bearer.description:
Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your valid token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9"
Bearer.name: Authorization
